a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual consumption of ozone-depleting substances (ODS). ODS consumption is measured units of ODS tonnes,
which is the amount of ODS consumed, multiplied by their respective ozone depleting potential value.
Note: In some years, gases can have negative consumption values. This occurs when countries destroy or export gases that were produced in
